---
category: news
title: "Chegg is a harbinger of AI’s disruptive force"
excerpt: "Whoever the long-term winners from generative AI turn out to be, companies thought to be in the crosshairs will face immediate consequences. Despite saying this week that AI had only had an impact on its business “at the margin”, Chegg is deemed by Wall Street to be worth just a third of what it was when ChatGPT was launched late last year."
